remarks: An interior in a subspace topology.  Willard in _General Topology_ says that there is no analog of ~ restcls for interiors.  In some sense, that is true.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 23-Jan-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
statement:
restcls.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
restcls.2 $e |- K = ( J |`t Y ) $.
restntr $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ Y C_ X /\ S C_ Y ) -> ( ( int ` K ) ` S ) = ( ( ( int ` J ) ` ( S u. ( X \ Y ) ) ) i^i Y ) ) $.
